item.title: Understanding Claude Code's Context Window
item.description: A look at how Claude Code’s context window works, what uses tokens, and how to manage it effectively with subagents, skills, and the /context command.

item.title: Code review with Claude Code
item.description: In my previous post How I Use Claude Code: My Complete Development Workflow I walked through my typical workflow which includes a step that has Claude perform some code reviews of it’s own work. I want to take some time to explore this a little further. The first time I heard someone suggest to have Claude review it’s own work I was confused. How could having the same thing that generated this code be helpful in reviewing it? The first time I did it though I was blown away. I gave it some concepts to look out for, reviewed the code myself first to see what I would want to change and made a mental note of it. From there I instructed Claude to review it’s work with an eye for a few specific concepts and it came back with a thorough report of changes that were in line with my vision.

item.title: How I Use Claude Code: My Complete Development Workflow
item.description: A deep dive into my daily Claude Code workflow, covering how I leverage the CLI tool for code exploration, implementation, refactoring, and debugging. Learn practical patterns that boost development productivity.
